title: ISic020587

layout.p: The text is placed on the underside of the vessel arranged in a spiral.

provenanceFound._: Found in Imera, at the Temple D.

facsimile.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana

repository._: Parco  Archeologico di Himera e Antiquarium

museum.name: Parco  Archeologico di Himera e Antiquarium
museum.description: Excellent collection of archaeological material from the site of Himera and the surrounding area (in particular Settefrati and Cefalu) arranged according to find spot
museum.address: Contrada Buonfornello - Termini Imerese (PA) On the hill above the temple
